name: Darkness is the nothing
description:
We need to find a soul spear and back to the darkness alive. As we are nothing without our souls.
You need to get out of the dark cave and pick up the spear of the soul from the golem. Beware of flying kites and hellish eyes. Take away the spear and go into the darkness. Try not to trip over the spikes. Use your hook to get close to objects.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use AWSD to move your character. SPACE to jump.You can also jump off the walls.
Right mouse button click to throw your grapling hook or spear.
To swing on your grapling hook, use buttons: A (left), D (right).
Left mouse button click to get close to the hooked object.
Press R to restart.
